description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 5/24/2006

After her confrontation with Stephanie, Taylor cries in Stephen’s arms, feeling betrayed by Stephanie. Bridget has a realization while talking with Nick about Brooke that Dante is the one for her.  Bridget leaves to find Dante. Nick confronts Stephanie about her offer to Brooke. Nick asks to buy Stephanie out of the company. When Stephanie refuses, Nick declares war on Stephanie. Bridget tells Dante she wants to work on their relationship, but after she leaves and Felicia starts to model, Dante’s not sure Bridget is the right one for him.
